DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of long-term administration of Lacosamide at doses up to 400 mg/day in Japanese and Chinese adults with Epilepsy who have completed the Treatment and Transition Period of EP0008 [NCT01710657]
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Long-term Adjunctive Therapy With Lacosamide in Adults With Partial-onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Subject has completed the Treatment and Transition Period of EP0008 [NCT01710657] Subjects who withdrew from EP0008 [NCT01710657]
